---
title: "FSC.A Densities"
format: html
---



```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
trait_files <- list.files(
  "/Volumes/rainer/RRD.Reclassification_final/flowcytometer_traits/",
  full.names = TRUE
)
lapply(
  trait_files,
  function(fn){
    traits <- read.rds(fn)
    x$FSC.A |> 
      density(bw = 0.00001) |>
      plot( main = paste0("FSC.A ", basename(fn))) |>
      abline( v = quantile(x$FSC.A, probs = c(0.05, 0.95), na.rm = TRUE) )
  }
)
```
